AzureBlade chuckled in a sinister tone.

AzureBlade: Ah yes! The big question!

He transformed and went next to Hydras.

AzureBlade: I attempted to get Nightlight's spark to break out of 
its Predacon shell, but the virus you installed activated anyways. 
The connection broke abruptly and she was Maximal again, but the 
virus was now in me. After some time, it finally took over me, but 
it did not destroy me. In fact, as I was half-predacon, it simply 
made my predacon part stronger. And now, I am here!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras::
> 
> "Then... fly alongside with me"replied Hydras and he suddenly 
> asked "What happened with BlackStorm aka Nighlight? and how did 
you 
> became a pred now?"
>

lab
